block-definition.s: get svg command from svg string %'svgstr'

block.l: const regex = /([a-zA-Z])([^a-zA-Z]*)/g; let cmdList = new List([]); let match; while ((match = regex.exec(svgstr)) !== null) { cmdList.add(new List([match[1],new List(match[2].trim().split(/[ ,]+/))])); } return cmdList;

block-definition.s: write text %'text' size %'size' by %'stepLength' gap %'gap' move %'move' style %'styleScript'

custom-block.s: get svg command from svg string %txt
run svg command %txt params %l lastPoint %l and return points
drawVector %l size %n style %cmdRing mirrored %b stitch length %n

block-definition.s: bezier curve points P1 %'p1' P2 %'p2' P3 %'p3' points number %'nb'
run svg command %'cmd' params %'params' lastPoint %'lastPoint' and return points

custom-block.s: bezier curve points P1 %l P2 %l P3 %l points number %n
bezier curve points P1 %l P2 %l P3 %l points number %n

block-definition.comment: Reports a sorted version of the list in its first input slot, using the comparison function in the second input slot. For a list of numbers, using < as the comparison function will sort from low to high; using > will sort from high to low.
block-definition.translations: ca:ordena _ segons criteri _

block-definition.s: follow curve points %'refPoints' style %'styleScript' by %'stepLength' go back %'goBack'
block-definition.translations: zh_CN:移动 _ 步 方式 _ 步长 _

block-definition.comment: This block reports "true" if there is a variable with this given name (input slot) in that context. It can be a global, sprite or script variable. Otherwise it reports "false".
block-definition.translations: pt:a variável _ existe ca:existeix la variable _ ? es:existe la variable _ ? de:existiert var _ ?

block-definition.comment: This block sets the given value (last input) to the variable named with the name givent (var input). It looks for that variable following the scope order 'script' -> 'sprite' -> 'global' (the first match it finds). If that variable does not exist (in any scope) an error happens, stopping their script. You can check it before using the "does var (name) exists?" block.
block-definition.translations: ca:assigna a _ el valor _ es:asignar a _ el valor _ pt:altera _ para _ de:setze var _ auf _

block-definition.comment: This block creates new variables on the selected scope: global (for all sprites), sprite (for this sprite only) or script (only for that blocks stack) with the names given (in 'names' list). If there is already a variable with that name in that scope, it does nothing: no errors and no overwrites.
block-definition.translations: pt:cria as variáveis _ _ ca:crea les _ variables _ es:crear las _ variables _ de:erstellen _ var _

block-definition.comment: This block reports the value of the variable with the name given. It looks for that variable following the scope order 'script' -> 'sprite' -> 'global' (the first match it finds). If that variable does not exist (in any scope) an error happens, stopping their script. You can check it before using the "does var (name) exists?" block.
block-definition.translations: pt:o valor de _

block-definition.comment: translate angle to or from polar coordinates
block-definition.translations: zh_CN:角度转换 _
zh_CN:线段长度 _
zh_CN:倾斜角 起点 _ 终点 _

block.l: function parametricSplineInterpolation(points, numPoints = 100) { if (points.length < 2) { throw new Error("Should have at least two pooints"); } const t = points.map((_, i) => i); const x = points.map(p => p.asArray()[0]); const y = points.map(p => p.asArray()[1]); // 计算三次样条插值的系数 function calculateCoefficients(t, values) { const n = t.length; const h = []; const alpha = []; const l = []; const mu = []; const z = []; const a = values.slice(); const b = new Array(n).fill(0); const c = new Array(n).fill(0); const d = new Array(n).fill(0); // 计算 h 和 alpha for (let i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) { h[i] = t[i + 1] - t[i]; alpha[i] = (3 / h[i]) * (a[i + 1] - a[i]) - (3 / (h[i - 1] || 1)) * (a[i] - a[i - 1] || 0); } // 计算 l, mu, z l[0] = 1; mu[0] = 0; z[0] = 0; for (let i = 1; i < n - 1; i++) { l[i] = 2 * (t[i + 1] - t[i - 1]) - h[i - 1] * mu[i - 1]; mu[i] = h[i] / l[i]; z[i] = (alpha[i] - h[i - 1] * z[i - 1]) / l[i]; } l[n - 1] = 1; z[n - 1] = 0; c[n - 1] = 0; // 计算 c, b, d for (let j = n - 2; j >= 0; j--) { c[j] = z[j] - mu[j] * c[j + 1]; b[j] = (a[j + 1] - a[j]) / h[j] - h[j] * (c[j + 1] + 2 * c[j]) / 3; d[j] = (c[j + 1] - c[j]) / (3 * h[j]); } return { a, b, c, d }; } // 计算 x 和 y 的插值系数 const xCoeff = calculateCoefficients(t, x); const yCoeff = calculateCoefficients(t, y); // 生成插值点 const result = []; const totalSegments = t.length - 1; const step = totalSegments / numPoints; for (let i = 0; i < numPoints; i++) { const ti = i * step; // 找到 ti 所在的区间 let segmentIndex = 0; for (let j = 0; j < t.length - 1; j++) { if (ti >= t[j] && ti <= t[j + 1]) { segmentIndex = j; break; } } // 计算 x 和 y 的插值值 const dt = ti - t[segmentIndex]; const xi = xCoeff.a[segmentIndex] * 1 + xCoeff.b[segmentIndex] * dt + xCoeff.c[segmentIndex] * dt * dt + xCoeff.d[segmentIndex] * dt * dt * dt; const yi = yCoeff.a[segmentIndex] * 1 + yCoeff.b[segmentIndex] * dt + yCoeff.c[segmentIndex] * dt * dt + yCoeff.d[segmentIndex] * dt * dt * dt; result.push(new List([xi, yi])); } return result; } let controlPoints = points.asArray(); let curvePoints = parametricSplineInterpolation(controlPoints,nb); return new List(curvePoints);

block-definition.comment: This block carries out the given script for each item of the given list, like the primitive FOR EACH. What's different is that it provides the # variable, which will contain the item number in the list of each item in turn, 1 while processing item 1, and so on.
block-definition.translations: ca:_ per cada _ de _ _
